verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H5057>leader<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1361>lifted<s%> up And you have <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I am a <S%H410>god,<s%> I <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> In the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%> ';Yet you are a <S%H120>man<s%> and not <S%H410>God,<s%> Although you <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> like the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> –
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you are <S%H2450>wiser<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel;<s%> There is <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5640>secret<s%> that is a <S%H6004>match<s%> for you.

"By your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> You have <S%H6213>acquired<s%> <S%H2428>riches<s%> for yourself, And have <S%H6213>acquired<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> for your <S%H214>treasuries.<s%>

"By your <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> by your <S%H7404>trade<s%> You have <S%H7235>increased<s%> your <S%H2428>riches,<s%> And your <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H1361>lifted<s%> up because of your <S%H2428>riches<s%> –

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> you have <S%H5414>made<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> Like the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> upon you, The <S%H6184>most<s%> <S%H6184>ruthless<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> And they will <S%H9553>draw<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> <S%H5921>Against<s%> the <S%H3308>beauty<s%> of your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> And <S%H2490>defile<s%> your <S%H3314>splendor.<s%>

'They will <S%H3381>bring<s%> you <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> And you will <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4463>death<s%> of those who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> In the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>

'Will you <S%H559>still<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "I am a <S%H430>god,<s%>" In the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of your <S%H2026>slayer,<s%> Although you are a <S%H120>man<s%> and not <S%H410>God,<s%> In the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of those who <S%H9135>wound<s%> you?

'You will <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> By the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers,<s%> For I have <S%H1696>spoken!<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%>"'"
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "You had the <S%H2856>seal<s%> of <S%H8508>perfection,<s%> <S%H4392>Full<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H3632>perfect<s%> in <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

"You were in <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> was your <S%H4540>covering:<s%> The <S%H124>ruby,<s%> the <S%H6357>topaz,<s%> and the <S%H3095>diamond;<s%> The <S%H8658>beryl,<s%> the <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> and the <S%H3471>jasper;<s%> The <S%H5601>lapis<s%> <S%H5601>lazuli,<s%> the <S%H5306>turquoise,<s%> and the <S%H9064>emerald;<s%> And the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> the <S%H4399>workmanship<s%> of your <S%H8596>settings<s%> and <S%H5345>sockets,<s%> Was in you. On the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you were <S%H1254>created<s%> They were <S%H3559>prepared.<s%>

"You were the <S%H4473>anointed<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> who <S%H5526>covers,<s%> And I <S%H5414>placed<s%> you [there.] You were on the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> You <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
"You were <S%H8549>blameless<s%> in your <S%H1870>ways<s%> From the <S%H3117>day<s%> you were <S%H1254>created,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> <S%H9390>unrighteousness<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> in you.

"By the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of your <S%H7404>trade<s%> You were <S%H8432>internally<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2555>violence,<s%> And you <S%H2398>sinned;<s%> Therefore I have <S%H2490>cast<s%> you as <S%H2490>profane<s%> From the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> And I have destroyed you, O <S%H6>covering<s%> <S%H5526>cherub,<s%> From the <S%H3742>midst<s%> of the <S%H8432>stones<s%> of <S%H68>fire.<s%>

"Your <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H1361>lifted<s%> up because of your <S%H3308>beauty;<s%> You <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> by <S%H5921>reason<s%> of your <S%H3314>splendor.<s%> I <S%H7993>cast<s%> you to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> I <S%H5414>put<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> That they may <S%H7200>see<s%> you.

"By the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> In the <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> of your <S%H7404>trade,<s%> You <S%H2490>profaned<s%> your <S%H4720>sanctuaries.<s%> Therefore I have <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you; It has <S%H398>consumed<s%> you, And I have <S%H5414>turned<s%> you to <S%H665>ashes<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> In the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H7200>see<s%> you.

<S%H3605>"All<s%> who <S%H3045>know<s%> you among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> Are <S%H8074>appalled<s%> at you; You have <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1091>terrified,<s%> And you will be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more<s%><S%H5704>.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>"' "
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her,

and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> you, O <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> And I shall be <S%H3513>glorified<s%> in your <S%H8432>midst.<s%> Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when I <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in her, And I shall <S%H6942>manifest<s%> My <S%H6942>holiness<s%> in her.

"For I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> to her And <S%H1818>blood<s%> to her <S%H2351>streets,<s%> And the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> in her <S%H8432>midst<s%> By the <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon her on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side;<s%> Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And there will be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H3992>prickling<s%> <S%H5544>brier<s%> or a <S%H3510>painful<s%> <S%H6975>thorn<s%> from <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> them who <S%H9589>scorned<s%> them; then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>"

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "When I <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> among <S%H834>whom<s%> they are <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> and shall <S%H6942>manifest<s%> My <S%H6942>holiness<s%> in them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> then they will <S%H3427>live<s%> in their <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

"And they will <S%H3427>live<s%> in it <S%H983>securely;<s%> and they will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> when I <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H9589>scorn<s%> them <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> them. Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>"' "
